properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.enabled
properties.description: If enabled, will provide an auto-configuration that will by default registered the Bean DateTime Scalar Extensions available in graphql-java-datetime for the DGS Framework.

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.date.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime Date scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.localDate.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime LocalDate scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.localDate.format
properties.description: If set, will format LocalDate scalar using pattern

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.localDateTime.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime LocalDateTime scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.localDateTime.format
properties.description: If set, will format LocalDatetime scalar using pattern

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.localTime.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime LocalTime scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.offsetDateTime.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime OffsetDateTime scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.yearMonth.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime YearMonth scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.duration.scalarName
properties.description: If set, will provide a custom name for the graphql-java-datetime Duration scalar

properties.name: dgs.graphql.datetime.scalars.zoneConversionENabled
properties.description: If set, will automatic zone conversion by adding the following property to your application.yaml. This will automatically convert between UTC and the default TimeZone for LocalDateTime
